column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Today I took a bath in my new apartment .
#text=It is the first time I bathed there so I need to get my things ready .
#text=First , I turned on the water and filled the bath up with nice warm water .
#text=I made sure that I have my shampoo , soap , and sponge ready to get in .
#text=Once I have those things , I hang my towel up on the towel rack and sink into the splendid bath .
#text=I always put some music so I can sing along in the shower .
#text=I make sure I scrub real good , especially behind my ears .
#text=After I get squeaky clean I relax for a little while longer , and get out the shower before I get wrinkly skin .
#text=Once Im out I shake off the excess water and dry my body real good with the towel , then I dry my hair with the blow dryer .
